QR menü ile ilgili bilgi almak istiyorsa.1: If you want to more information please write us!

QR kodu okutarak menüyü,müşterilerinize.1: You can show the menu to your customers by scanning the QR code

Sosyal Medyada Bize Ulaşın.1: Contact with us on Social Media

Biz Kimiz Ne Yapıyoruz.1: Who we are and what we are doing?

Kodluyoruz Adana Full Stack Development.1: This project is a graduation project of Kodluyoruz Adana Full Stack Development Bootcamp

Şu anda içinde bulunduğumuz pandemi süre.1: We aim to create an OR code digital menu that restaurants can use during the pandemic process we are currently in and to reduce the physcial contact.

Projemiz 2 ana kısımdan oluşmaktadır.1: Our project consists of two main parts.

React kütüphanesi ile önyüz oluşturmak.1: 2 - Create an UI page via React Library.

NodeJsde neler yaptık.1: What we have done with NodeJS?

MongoDB ye kayıt olup amazonun bulut sun.1: We registered to MongoDB and created a database on Amazon's cloud server.

Express ile uygulamamızı oluşturduk ne m.1: We created our application with Express and connected to our database on the cloud server with Mongoose.

Restoranlar için User modeli oluşturduk.1: We created a User model for restaurants, encrypted the user passwords to our database with the bcrypt library. Thus, we could easily provide session control with Json Web Token.

Son olarak yayına hazır olmadan önce olu.1: Lastly, we wrote a Unit test on the structures we created before they were ready for publication.

React kısmında neler yaptık.1: What have we done as a part of React?

Bootstrap Html ve CSS kullanarak tasarım.1: We skeletonized the design using Bootstrap Html and CSS

Componentlerimizi parçalayarak modüler b.1: We created all our components as a modular system by breaking down our components.

React-router-dom kullanarak navbarımızı.1: We made our navbar functional using React-router-dom

Bootstrap card kullanarak menümüzü oluşt.1: We created our menu using Bootstrap card.

Restoran menümüzü oluşturduktan sonra, m.1: After creating our restaurant menu, we created the details of the menu on a separate page.

Tüm detayları bir json dosyasında tuttuk.1: We kept all the details in a json file and wrote it to our page with the map function.

React ın bize sağladığı qrcode react adl.1: We have created a component that creates restaurant-specific QR code using the library called qrcode.react provided by React.

Her yeni restoran veri tabanına kayıt ya.1: Each time a new restaurant is registered to the database, we dynamically created the qrcode according to the name of the place.

Api çekerken context kullandık useReduce.1: We used context while pulling api. We applied certain post, update, delete methods with useReducer.

Menü modeli oluşturduk burada modeli iki.1: We created a menu model and divided the model into two parts.For example, we had two models named food section and detail of the food section.We created them by grouping with aggregate.
